title: All Sony Xperia Z models to get Android 5.0 Lollipop starting February 2015 | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Sony AndroidLollipop]()**Sony announced that[Android 5.0Lollipop](https://www.trustedreviews.com/android-5-0-lollipop-review) will becoming to the entire range of Xperia Z devices beginning in February 2015. **Mike Fasulo, President and COO of Sony Electronics, made the announcementduring Sony’s press conference at CES 2015.“We made great progress here in the United States market with our criticallyacclaimed [Xperia Z3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/sony-xperia-z3-review)and Xperia Z3v as well as the exciting new partnership with Verizon inaddition to our very strong relationship with T-Mobile and as you may haveheard both devices are part of our initiative to bring Android 5.0 Lollipop tothe entire Xperia Z series starting globally next month.”Fasulo didn’t provide exact dates or the order that the Xperia Z3, [XperiaZ2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/sony-xperia-z2-review) and Z1 will begetting the Android update neither did he specifically mention any of theXperia Z range of tablets.**Read more:** [CES 2015 – all the latest news and hands-ons  ](https://www.trustedreviews.com/hubs/ces-2015)  Not only is Sony committed to bringing Android to it’s flagship range ofphones and tablets it’s also adding Android to it’s new range of smart TVs.This gives Android phone and tablet users the ability to throw content fromtheir devices directly to their Sony TV without the need of a separate productlike the [Chromecast](https://www.trustedreviews.com/google-chromecast-review)or [Roku Streaming Stick](https://www.trustedreviews.com/roku-streaming-stick-review).
